code: import React from'react';import{Clock}from'lucide-react';import'./DeadlinesPanel.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeadlinesPanel=_ref=>{let{deadlines,loading}=_ref;if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadlines-panel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadlines-loading",children:"Loading deadlines..."})});}if(!deadlines){return null;}const formatDateTime=dateString=>{if(!dateString)return'N/A';try{const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toLocaleString('en-US',{month:'2-digit',day:'2-digit',year:'numeric',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit',hour12:true});}catch(_unused){return'N/A';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"deadlines-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"deadlines-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Clock,{size:16}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"deadlines-title",children:"Deadlines"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"deadlines-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"deadline-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadline-label",children:"Contributor Deadline for Submitting Hours:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadline-value",children:formatDateTime(deadlines.contributorDeadline)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"deadline-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadline-label",children:"PM Approval Deadline:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadline-value",children:formatDateTime(deadlines.pmApprovalDeadline)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"deadline-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadline-label",children:"Payment Generation Date:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deadline-value",children:formatDateTime(deadlines.paymentGenerationDate)})]})]})]});};export default DeadlinesPanel;
